message: Calling all associates! Whether you are looking for strategies to improve your reputation, develop strong workplace habits, or something else, our next Justia Webinar is designed just for you.

Join Equinox Strategy Partners Managing Director Lana Manganiello and Murtaugh, Treglia, Stern & Deily Partner Benjamin Schwefel on Friday, November 17 at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT for Driving Your Success: Essential Habits for Law Firm Associates in the Post-Pandemic Landscape, a members-only presentation aimed at promoting law firm associate achievement and success.
bottomline: Ready to accept your invitation? RSVP today!

message: Associates looking to enhance their career progression must take affirmative steps to set themselves up for long-term success in the legal profession. Honing key skills can allow associates to develop habits that result in improved legal acumen while building meaningful relationships and a differentiated reputation.

Join Equinox Strategy Partners Managing Director Lana Manganiello and Murtaugh, Treglia, Stern & Deily Partner Benjamin Schwefel Friday, November 17 at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT for Driving Your Success: Essential Habits for Law Firm Associates in the Post-Pandemic Landscape, a members-only presentation aimed at promoting law firm associate achievement and success.
Reminder: You are registered for Driving Your Success: Essential Habits for Law Firm Associates in the Post-Pandemic Landscape on Friday, November 17, 2023 at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT.

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Driving Your Success: Essential Habits for Law Firm Associates in the Post-Pandemic Landscape. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
